short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes Pro-Abortion language back into English.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension helps uncover the real meaning behind the words used in the abortion debate. For example, the word "abortion" will be temporarily translated to: "BABY KILLING" (which is accurate and helps clarify what is really being talked about).
